snippet: The climb to record levels is being driven by strong third-quarter corporate earnings, projected to be up 8.9 percent for the average S.&P. 500 company.
abstract: Stock market ekes out another closing high, driven by strong third-quarter corporate earnings.
lead_paragraph: The climb to record levels is being driven by strong third-quarter corporate earnings, projected to be up 8.9 percent for the average S.&P. 500 company.

headline.main: Up Slightly, Markets Manage to Close Again on a High Note
headline.print_headline: Up Slightly, Markets Manage to Close Again on a High Note
